files.patch:
@@ -957,0 +957,1 @@
+    @Override
@@ -962,3 +963,1 @@
-     * Computes a hashcode for this charset.
-     *
-     * @return  An integer hashcode
+     * {@return a hashcode for this charset}
@@ -966,0 +965,1 @@
+    @Override
@@ -979,0 +979,1 @@
+    @Override
@@ -980,2 +981,0 @@
-        if (!(ob instanceof Charset))
-            return false;
@@ -984,1 +983,1 @@
-        return name.equals(((Charset)ob).name());
+        return ob instanceof Charset other && name.equals(other.name());

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@

+ * Copyright (c) 2008, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -51,1 +51,1 @@
-        if (!(obj instanceof UnixFileKey))
+        if (!(obj instanceof UnixFileKey other))
@@ -53,1 +53,0 @@
-        UnixFileKey other = (UnixFileKey)obj;

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2008, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2008, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -237,1 +237,1 @@
-        if (!(ob instanceof UnixFileStore))
+        if (!(ob instanceof UnixFileStore other))
@@ -239,1 +239,0 @@
-        UnixFileStore other = (UnixFileStore)ob;

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2008, 2021, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2008, 2023, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -84,1 +84,1 @@

+            if (!(obj instanceof User other))
@@ -86,1 +86,0 @@
-            User other = (User)obj;
